ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Cannot be the same as product code')
MlsTrans('Must not be with the same material')
IF((Trim({3,43}) = '' OR ISNULL({3,43})) AND {32768,102} AND Stat(0,'CM'MODE), 'FALSE'LOG, 'TRUE'LOG)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select O.Code, O.Name, O.Qauntity, O.ToWH, O.PriceList, O.OcrCode, O1.Code 'ItemCode', O1.ChildNum, O1.Quantity, O1.Warehouse, O1.Uom from OITT O LEFT JOIN ITT1 O1 on O.Code=O1.Father where (O.Code like '%'+':1'+'%')

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'Code,Name,Qauntity,WhsName,ListName,OcrName,ItemName,Quantity,WhsName,Uom', 'Code,Product Name,Quantity,Warehouse,Price List,Distribution Rule,Item Material,Quantity Material,Warehouse Material,UoM Material',{32768,84},';','',0)
